skills.title: Front-End
skills.description: I craft user-friendly, visually appealing interfaces that create seamless and engaging experiences. My focus is on delivering intuitive designs that make digital interaction effortless and enjoyable.

skills.title: Back-End
skills.description: I build secure and scalable backend systems, ensuring smooth, efficient performance. My aim is to provide the solid foundation that supports seamless user experiences and optimal functionality.

skills.title: AI/ML
skills.description: I leverage AI and ML to transform data into intelligent solutions that automate tasks, solve complex problems, and evolve systems for smarter outcomes.

skills.title: Soft Skills
skills.description: My strong communication and leadership skills help me collaborate effectively, motivate teams, and drive projects forward. I value clarity, active listening, and fostering positive relationships in every setting.

portfolio.title: FoodMunch
portfolio.description: Responsive food catalog website with seamless navigation and product videos.

portfolio.title: Job Search
portfolio.description: Comprehensive job search platform with React, JWT authentication, and routing.

portfolio.title: Todo App
portfolio.description: A task management app built with React, Redux, CSS animations.

portfolio.title: NxtTrendz
portfolio.description: A replica of an e-commerce site with shopping features.

portfolio.title: Holidays Site
portfolio.description: A website offering travel packages, booking, and customer services

portfolio.title: Grocery Store
portfolio.description: An full stack online platform for browsing and purchasing grocery items.

portfolio.title: Book Recommendation System
portfolio.description: A machine learning-based system suggesting books based on preferences.

portfolio.title: Medical Image Analysis
portfolio.description: A project using deep learning to analyze and interpret medical images.

portfolio.title: Meeting room
portfolio.description: A task management app built with React, Redux, CSS animations.
